javadoc:
A factory for deserializing {@link DWARFAttributeValue dwarf attribute} from
 a stream.

methods.name: read
methods.comment: Read from the given BinaryReader based on the type of DWARFForm that is given.

params.name: reader
params.comment: BinaryReader pointing to the value to read

params.name: form
params.comment: DWARFForm type defining the type of value to read

return.comment: Object representing the value that was read

name: DWARFAttributeFactory
comment:
A factory for deserializing DWARFAttributeValue from
 a stream.

fields.javadoc: Max number of bytes that dw_form_block4 is allowed to specify, 1Mb.
fields.name: MAX_BLOCK4_SIZE
fields.comment: Max number of bytes that dw_form_block4 is allowed to specify, 1Mb.
